column1: The '''Deeping Wall''' was the solid stone wall
column2: some twenty feet in height and thick enough that four men could walk abreast along the top
column3: that defended the refuges of the [[Rohirrim]] at [[Helm's Deep]]. It lay beneath the castle of the [[Hornburg]]
column4: to which it was connected by a flight of steps.<ref name="Helm">{{TT|III7}}</ref> In the [[Battle of the Hornburg]] (on [[3 March]]
column5: {{TA|3019}}<ref>{{App|Great}}</ref>) it was breached for the only time in its history by a besieging army of [[Orcs]] and [[Dunlendings]]
column6: but they were soon driven back and defeated.<ref name="Helm"/>
